org.elasticsearch.action.bulk

接口 MappingUpdatePerformer


  • public interface MappingUpdatePerformer

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void updateMappings(Mapping update, ShardId shardId, java.lang.String type)
      Update the mappings on the master.
      void verifyMappings(Mapping update, ShardId shardId)
      Throws a ReplicationOperation.RetryOnPrimaryException if the operation needs to be retried on the primary due to the mappings not being present yet, or a different exception if updating the mappings on the master failed.

    • 方法详细资料

        Update the mappings on the master.

      • verifyMappings

        void verifyMappings(Mapping update,
                    ShardId shardId)
        Throws a ReplicationOperation.RetryOnPrimaryException if the operation needs to be retried on the primary due to the mappings not being present yet, or a different exception if updating the mappings on the master failed.
